name: Multiplayer RPG (V0.0.1)
description:
This is a MMORPG I'm currently working on,

Currently you can host and join rooms but sadly there isn't actually any real gameplay just yet. But there should be very soon :):)

Known Issues:

  • Only Idle  Animations Will Work
  • Limited World To Explore

Anyway, hope you enjoy what you can do currently.
